Posts.Content: Hi. Around 3 weeks ago i was diagnosed with breast cancer and Wednesday just gone i had a mastectomy on my left breast. Still abit sore but im getting there. Going to see oncologist today to see when chemo starts. I have two young children at home and found out i was pregnant the week after i found out i had breast cancer.
Posts.Title: 24 years old and been diagnosed with breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thankyou heather. Yes it was quite a shock to say the least but hopefully today is where i know when chemo is going to start so it is the beginning of curing me. This time next year i am determined to be a survivor who fought it with all she has in her. And thanx again
Posts.Title: 24 years old and been diagnosed with breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thankyou beejay. I have to be strong its the only way to be around my children. Dont worry too much about your mastectomy it isn't all that bad the way i look at it is if my breast has gone most of the cancer has gone and i would be quite happy for them to take the other as well. Sending you all the luck in the world for your mastectomy
Posts.Title: 24 years old and been diagnosed with breast cancer
